name: Phineas and Ferb: Ride Again
description: Phineas and Ferb: Ride Again is a platformer video game based on the television series Phineas and Ferb, and a sequel of the game Phineas and Ferb, developed by Altron and published by Disney Interactive Studios. It was released in North America on September 14, 2010, and later in PAL regions on April 1, 2011. It continues with the two inventor brothers, Phineas and Ferb, making another four big projects, including a rockin' skateboard course and a spaceship. Meanwhile, Perry wants to foil Dr. Doofenshmirtz's plans.
